resources.string: Please Set the User Name and User Picture
I want to share my score !

Hello friend~ Welcome to 'Shaking Dice' 

 Before you start the game, you can set the user name and image at the login page.

 There are 5 questions in this game.

 When you start the game, two dices will be displayed.

 If you shack your phone to left or right, two dices will be rolled and sum of two dice numbers will be displayed as X.

 When you look at the question, each qustion includes X. So, you can solve the quesion by putting sum of two dice numbers to X.

 Each question have different score (1 ~ 5 score) and level of difficulty.

 Also, you must enter the answer as the integer type, NOT DECIMAL type.

 After finish 5 questions, your total score will be displayed. Also, you can share your score to your twitter account!

 Through the setting button, you can choose the background music and you can see the ranking through the ranking button.

 Now, Are you ready to play ??
